data.title: Direct Line Global
data.meta_description:
Direct Line Global | 6,385 followers on LinkedIn. Direct Line (DL) is a leading technology infrastructure services provider
enabling mission-critical data center infrastructure for the world’s technology
leaders. Catering to a broad spectrum of technology and client requirements,
1100+ skilled technicians deliver over 1000 projects annually across data
center markets in the US and APAC.
data.text: The app you just used to check the weather. The TV series you binge-watched when you should have been going to sleep. The AI tool that helped you plan your summer trip. What do they have in common? They’re all made possible by data centers. Blackstone’s QTS Data Centers is the fastest growing data center company in the world. Come take a look inside one of our assets:
